column1: This sheet represents the master video playlist of Cortex Code demos from our internal teams. They will be featured on all our social channels when published.

If you'd like to add your video to this master playlist, 1) make sure a video below doesn't already exist. 2) submit your name and details below for review. 3) Krista & Elani will schedule time with you to record your demo.

column13: Build In Snowflake Faster With Cortex Code CLI
column14:
Learn how Cortex Code CLI brings Snowflake expertise into your terminal or favorite IDE, so you can turn plain-language prompts into real work inside Snowflake. 

Explore built-in skills for pipelines, semantic views, and agents, plus how to extend Cortex Code with your own skills.

column1: dbt Development in a Single Prompt
column6: Q1 Coco + DE Use Cases Video Briefs
column12: dbt Development in a Single Prompt
column13: Build dbt Projects in Snowflake with a Single Prompt
column14:
Build a complete dbt project in Snowflake with a single prompt using Cortex Code CLI.

See how Cortex Code scans source tables, generates models, adds tests, runs builds, validates outputs, and produces a shareable report, all from your terminal. What used to take hours of context-switching across tools now takes minutes.

column1: Optimizing dbt for speed and cost
column6: Q1 Coco + DE Use Cases Video Briefs
column13: Optimize dbt Projects for Speed With Cortex Code
column14:
dbt projects are easy to build, but keeping them fast and cost-efficient is another challenge. As source tables grow and models become more complex, runtimes increase and performance issues get harder to pinpoint.

In this demo, Cortex Code CLI analyzes your project’s run_results.json, identifies the slowest models, flags unused ones, and suggests specific optimizations you can apply immediately, all from a single prompt in your terminal.

column1: Airflow - Debugging a failed DAG run
column6: Q1 Coco + DE Use Cases Video Briefs
column13: Debug Apache Airflow® DAG Failures With Snowflake Cortex Code
column14:
Learn how Cortex Code CLI helps you debug a failed Airflow DAG run end to end, from task status to dbt logs and Snowflake validation. See how a single prompt traces a failed dbt model, inspects the model SQL, checks upstream dependencies in Snowflake, and identifies the root cause, a broken source table. 

This workflow fits Airflow running locally, on Kubernetes, or on MWAA, and supports follow-up prompts for data quality checks and downstream impact analysis.
